sentences.sContent: I turned to speak to the person standing behind me.
sentences.sCn: 我转身和站在我后面的那人说话。

sentences.sContent: Someone could easily creep up behind us.
sentences.sCn: 很可能有人跟在我们后面。

sentences.sContent: The car behind was hooting impatiently.
sentences.sCn: 后面那辆车不耐烦地按着喇叭。

sentences.sContent: Jane shut the door behind her.
The manager was sitting behind a large desk.
sentences.sCn: 经理坐在一张大办公桌的后面。

sentences.sContent: Rising into the hills behind are 800 acres of parkland.
sentences.sCn: 往上延伸至后面小山的是800英亩的草木区。

trans.tranOther: at or towards the back of a thing or person
